goals__remit:
With 20 years of experience as a Brussels-based communications and public relations agency, PRACSIS offers targeted and tailored communication strategies across the globe, including stakeholder engagement campaigns, the organisation of professional conferences, events and exhibitions, as well as large Web sites, print production, press and social media coverage. 
We act as added value creators, boosting your visibility and business outreach and connecting you with the right audience. With a solid expertise in eco-innovation and green growth, our team includes senior consultants in EU public affairs, agriculture, energy, environment and the bioeconomy. PRACSIS creates content and spreads it through multi-channel dissemination strategies, reaching out to your target group and leveraging your professional network.
